info.title: IumTweb_project
info.description: This API is part of the IUM-TWEB project for the 2023-2024 academic year at the Dipartimento di Informatica, Universit√† di Torino. Designed to enable both fans and pundits to access and analyze a wide range of football data, this API supports functionalities across multiple servers (two Express servers and one Java Spring server). It provides interfaces for querying football competitions, clubs, and player statistics, and integrates with MongoDB and Postgres databases to manage dynamic and static datasets respectively. [ IUM-TWEB Group Accornero, Aiello, Bonincontro ]

servers.description: MainServer - Can handle all API requests.

get.summary: Retrieve all competitions available in the database

200.description: Successful - A list of all competitions.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve all competitions grouped by country

200.description: Successful - A list of all competitions grouped by country.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve all information about the competition specified by competition_id

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the competition to retrieve

200.description: Successful - A single competition object

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve competition name by competition ID

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the competition to retrieve

200.description: Successful -  Retrive the name of the competition

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Search clubs by competition ID and season
get.description: Retrieves a list of clubs participating in a given competition for a specified season.

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the competition

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season for which to retrieve club data

200.description: Successful - retrieval of club list for the specified competition and season.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve last season for a specified club

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the club

200.description: Successful - retrieval of last season for the club.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve all clubs grouped by their initial character

200.description: Successful retrieval of clubs grouped by initial character.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get club by ID
get.description: Returns information about a club based on club ID.

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: ID of the club

200.description: Successful - Returns information about the club with the specified ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get clubs grouped by initial and name
get.description: Returns clubs grouped by initial letter and with names similar to the specified name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name to search for

200.description: Successful - Returns clubs grouped by initial letter and with names similar to the specified name.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve match events by game ID
get.description: Retrieves a list of events for a specified game, providing details like who did the goal assist, who is the subbed player...

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the game

200.description: Return a list of match events, with info about minute,type, player, assist (who did assist, could be undefined), substitute (who subbed, could be undefined)

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

post.description: Returns a response if the user exists

200.description: Successful login.

500.description: Internal Server Error

200.description: Successful registration.

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.summary: Retrieve all players
get.description: Retrieves a list of all players in the database.

200.description: Successful - A list of all players in the database.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Search players by club ID and season
get.description: Retrieves a list of players who played for a given club in a specified season.

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the club

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season for which to retrieve player data

200.description: Successful - A list of all players that played in a certain club in a certain season

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get player by competition ID
get.description: Retrieves players based on a competition ID.

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the competition

200.description: Successful - A list of players that are playing in the competition specified by competition_id.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get player by competition ID and last season, sorted by value
get.description: Retrieves players based on a competition ID and the last season, sorted by market value in a descending manner.

parameters.name: competitionId
parameters.description: The competition's unique identifier

parameters.name: lastSeason
parameters.description: The last season of interest

200.description: Successful - A list of players that played in a certain competition and in a certain season, sorted by value

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get information about domestic competition
get.description: Returns all the current domestic competition basic info(id and name) that are in the Players table, sorted alphabetically by competition name.

200.description: Successful - A list of small competition object with two fields: id and name.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get all the nationalities
get.description: Retrives all the country of citizenship that are in the Players table, sorted alphabetically.

200.description: Successful - A list of strings that are all the nationalities (Without null).

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get top 150 players by market value
get.description: Retrieves a list of the top 150 players sorted by their market value in a descending manner.

200.description: Successful - A list of top 150 players.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Find players by letter in name
get.description: Retrieves a list of players whose names contain a specified letter.

parameters.name: letter
parameters.description: The letter to search for in player names

200.description: Successful - A list of players.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get players' image URLs by player ID
get.description: Returns image URLs associated with player IDs.

parameters.name: starting
parameters.description: A list of integers, contains all the player IDs of the players who start a match

parameters.name: substitutes
parameters.description: A list of integers, contains all the player IDs of the players who are on the bench

200.description: Successful - Returns image URLs of players associated with player_id

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get player by ID
get.description: Returns information about a player based on player ID.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: ID of the player

200.description: Successful - Returns information about the player with the specified ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get 5 random players by competition ID and last season
get.description: Returns 5 random players who participated in a specific competition during a certain season.

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: ID of the competition

parameters.name: last_season
parameters.description: Last season in which the players participated

200.description: Successful - Returns 5 random players who participated in the specified competition and season.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get players by competition ID, nationality, and role
get.description: Returns players who participated in a specific competition, with a specific nationality and role.

parameters.name: competitionId
parameters.description: ID of the competition

parameters.name: nation
parameters.description: Nationality of the players

parameters.name: specificRole
parameters.description: Specific role of the players

200.description: Successful - Returns players who participated in the specified competition, with the specified nationality and role.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get player number by player ID
get.description: Retrieves the player number assigned to a player for a specific game based on the player's ID.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the player.

200.description: Successful - Returns the player number.

playerNumber.description: Number assigned to the player for the game.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve players participating in a match
get.description: Fetches a list of all players participating in a specific match, categorized by home and away teams.

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: The game ID for which player information is needed.

parameters.name: home_club_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the home club.

parameters.name: away_club_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the away club.

200.description: Successful - Returns a list of players for both teams, divided in starting_lineup and substitutes

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get  player valuation per year
get.description: Retrieves the average valuation for a player (in EUR) for each year in which it was evaluated, based on the player's ID.

parameters.name: idPlayer
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the player.

200.description: Successful - Returns average market values per year for the player.

oneOf.description: The average market value in the year

items.description: An array where the first item is the year and the second item is the average rating

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get last matches by competition ID
get.description: Retrieves the last matches (games) based on the provided competition ID.

parameters.name: competitionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the competition.

200.description: Successful - Returns the last matches.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get round numbers by competition ID and season
get.description: Retrieves all the possible round in a competition in a certain season, based on the provided competition ID and season.

parameters.name: comp_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the competition.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season for which we want to know all the rounds.

200.description: Successful - Returns the round numbers.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get matches by competition, season, and round
get.description: Retrieves matches (games) based on the provided competition, season, and round.

parameters.name: comp_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the competition.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season year.

parameters.name: currentRound
parameters.description: The round of the competition.

200.description: Successful - Returns the matches.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get last manager by club ID
get.description: Retrieves the last manager based on the provided club ID.

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the club.

200.description: Successful - Returns the last manager.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get last games by club ID
get.description: Retrieves the last games, basing on date, based on the provided club ID and the provided Season. The result could be limited using a parameter called limit

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the club.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season we want to consider in our search

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If this parameter is defined, the result will be limited, otherwise the query return all the values

200.description: Successful - Returns the last games of a club.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get clubs divided by groups
get.description: Retrieves clubs divided by groups based on the provided competition ID and season. This method should be used only for a competition that have groups

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the competition.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season year.

200.description: Successful - Returns clubs divided by groups.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get competition seasons sorted
get.description: Retrieves competition seasons sorted in descending order based on the provided competition ID.

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the competition.

200.description: Successful - Returns the sorted competition seasons.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get competition IDs with group
get.description: Returns a list of competition IDs that are all the competitions that have divisions in groups (e.g., Group A, Group B, etc.).

200.description: Successful - Returns a list of competition IDs.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get sub positions grouped by position
get.description: Returns all the possible subPosition that are in Players table (for example: Left Winger) grouped by general position (for example: Striker)

200.description: Successful - Returns a hash map where each key is related to a certain position, and the value is a list of all sub position related to position.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get games by ID
get.description: Returns information about a game based on game ID.

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: ID of the game

200.description: Successful - Returns information about the game with the specified ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get seasons by club id
get.description: Returns information about all the season numbers when the club (specified by club_id) played at least one game .

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: The identifier of the club

200.description: Successful - It returns a list of objects that have a field called season, a number that corresponds to the starting year of the season

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get table by competition,season,type and round
get.description: Returns information about a competition table in a certain season, that is a classification where squads are ordered based on the games played. Could be used to get classification for a Group, if competition is grouped

parameters.name: comp_id
parameters.description: The unique competition identifier

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season we want competition for

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The competition typology, could be full, home, away

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: If the competition is grouped, it's the group whose table we want

200.description: Successful - Returns information about the game with the specified ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get head to head statistics
get.description: retrives the number of win of the home club, the number of draws and the number of win of the away club

parameters.name: home_club_id
parameters.description: The identifier of the club that played at home in the match whose statistics we are interested in

parameters.name: away_club_id
parameters.description: The identifier of the club that played away in the match whose statistics we are interested in

200.description: Successful - Returns a list of object which have three fields: homeWins, Draws, awayWins.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get player statistics
get.description: Returns statistics of a player including yellow cards, red cards, goals, total assists, total minutes played, appearances...

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: ID of the player

200.description: Successful - Return an object that contain statistics of the specified player.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get top scorer
get.description: Return the all-time ranking of the players who scored the most goals in the competition. The classification is limited to 10 result

parameters.name: comp_id
parameters.description: ID of the competition

200.description: Successful - Return a list of object with player name, player id and total goals.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: Get player  games
get.description: Returns all games of a player sorted by the most recent, with detailed statistics of what player has done in the match (goals, assists...)

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: ID of the player

200.description: Successful - Return the games of Player.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server while processing the request.

countryId.description: Identifier for the country associated with the competition

countryName.description: Name of the country associated with the competition

domesticLeagueCode.description: Code of the domestic league related to the competition

confederation.description: Confederation to which the competition belongs

url.description: URL with more information about the competition

clubId.description: The unique identifier for the club.

domesticCompetitionId.description: Identifier of the domestic competition the club participates in.

totalMarketValue.description: Total market value of the club.

squadSize.description: Number of players in the club.

averageAge.description: Average age of the club players.

foreignersNumber.description: Number of foreign players in the club.

foreignersPercentage.description: Percentage of foreign players in the club.

nationalTeamPlayers.description: Number of players in the club who are also national team players.

netTransferRecord.description: Net transfer record of the club.

lastSeason.description: Performance of the club in the last season.

url.description: URL to more information about the club.

game_event_id.description: Unique identifier for the game event.

date.description: Date and time when the game event occurred.

game_id.description: Identifier of the game associated with the event.

minute.description: Minute of the game when the event occurred.

type.description: Type of event (e.g., goal, card, substitution).

club_id.description: Identifier of the club involved in the event.

player_id.description: Identifier of the player involved in the event.

player_assist_id.description: Identifier of the player who assisted in the event, if applicable.

player_in_id.description: Identifier of the player who came in during a substitution, if applicable.

game_lineups_id.description: Unique identifier for the game lineup entry.

game_id.description: Identifier of the game to which the lineup is associated.

club_id.description: Identifier of the club for which the lineup is set.

type.description: Type of the lineup (starting_lineup, substitute, reserve).

number.description: Shirt number of the player in this lineup.

player_id.description: Identifier of the player in the lineup.

player_name.description: Name of the player in the lineup.

team_captain.description: Indicates whether the player is the team captain. Defaults to false if not specified.

position.description: Playing position of the player in the lineup.

competition_id.description: Identifier for the competition in which the game is played.

season.description: Season year in which the game is played.

date.description: Date and time when the game is scheduled or was played.

home_club_goals.description: Number of goals scored by the home club.

away_club_goals.description: Number of goals scored by the away club.

home_club_position.description: League position of the home club at the time of the game.

away_club_position.description: League position of the away club at the time of the game.

home_club_manager_name.description: Name of the home club's manager.

away_club_manager_name.description: Name of the away club's manager.

stadium.description: Stadium where the game is played.

attendance.description: Number of spectators attending the game.

referee.description: Name of the referee officiating the game.

url.description: URL to more detailed information about the game.

competition_type.description: Type of the competition, e.g., 'domestic league', 'international cup'.

appearance_id.description: Unique identifier for the player's appearance in a game.

game_id.description: Identifier of the game in which the player appeared.

player_id.description: Identifier of the player who appeared in the game.

player_club_id.description: Identifier of the club the player was representing in the game.

player_current_club_id.description: Identifier of the player's current club at the time of the game.

date.description: Date of the game in which the appearance occurred.

competition_id.description: Identifier of the competition in which the appearance occurred.

yellow_cards.description: Number of yellow cards received by the player during the game. Defaults to 0 if none.

red_cards.description: Number of red cards received by the player during the game. Defaults to 0 if none.

goals.description: Number of goals scored by the player during the game. Defaults to 0 if none.

assists.description: Number of assists made by the player during the game. Defaults to 0 if none.

minutes_played.description: Total minutes played by the player in the game.

game_id.description: Identifier of the game associated with these club game details.

club_id.description: Identifier of the club that this game data belongs to.

own_goals.description: Number of goals scored by the club in the game.

own_manager_name.description: Name of the manager of the club in this game.

own_position.description: League position of the club at the time of the game.

opponent_id.description: Identifier of the opponent club in the game.

opponent_goals.description: Number of goals scored by the opponent club in the game.

opponent_position.description: League position of the opponent club at the time of the game.

opponent_manager_name.description: Name of the opponent club's manager.

hosting.description: Indicates whether the club was playing at home or away.

is_win.description: Indicates the game result from the club's perspective. 1 for win, 0 for draw or loss.

lastSeason.description: Last season played by the player.

currentClubId.description: Identifier of the player's current club.

countryOfBirth.description: Country of birth of the player.

cityOfBirth.description: City of birth of the player.

countryOfCitizenship.description: Country of citizenship of the player.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the player.

subPosition.description: Sub-position of the player on the field.

position.description: Primary playing position of the player.

heightInCm.description: Height of the player in centimeters.

marketValueInEur.description: Current market value of the player in euros.

highestMarketValueInEur.description: Highest market value reached by the player in euros.

contractExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the player's current contract.

url.description: URL to more detailed information about the player.

currentClubDomesticCompetitionId.description: Identifier of the domestic competition in which the player's current club participates.

currentClubName.description: Name of the player's current club.

id.description: Unique identifier for the player valuation.

playerId.description: Identifier of the player to whom the valuation pertains.

lastSeason.description: Last season for which the valuation is relevant.

datetime.description: The exact date and time when the valuation was recorded.

date.description: The date when the valuation was recorded.

dateweek.description: The week of the date when the valuation was recorded.

marketValueInEur.description: The market value of the player in euros at the time of valuation.

n.description: An integer value associated with the player valuation, specific to the business logic.

currentClubId.description: Identifier of the club to which the player belongs at the time of valuation.

playerClubDomesticCompetitionId.description: Identifier of the domestic competition in which the player's club participates.
